column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Bumi says : " Bum - Ju , you 're okay .
#Text=" Korra says : " No .
#Text=I think that link is gone , forever .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I see .
#Text=Why do n't you close the portals , and we 'll go home .
#Text=" Korra says : " Maybe I should n't .
#Text=" Tenzin says : " What do you mean ?
#Text=" Korra says : " What if Unalaq was right when he said the Avatar should n't be a bridge between the two worlds ?
#Text=What if Avatar Wan made a mistake when he closed the portals ?
#Text=What if humans and spirits were n't meant to live apart ?
#Text=Well , what do you think I should do ?
#Text=" Tenzin says : " I think you should trust your instincts .
#Text=There is nothing else I can teach you .
#Text=You are the Avatar .
#Text=Whatever your decision , I support you .
#Text=" Mako says : " Hey , can we talk ?
#Text=" Korra says : " Of course .
#Text=" Mako says : " There 's something I 've been wanting to tell you about that fight we had .
#Text=I know I said it was n't that bad , but , that 's not exactly true .
#Text=I , um ... I - I broke up with you .
#Text=" Korra says : " I remember .
#Text=" Mako says : " But , I thought you said you lost part of your memory .
#Text=" Korra says : " I did , but being inside the Tree of Time brought it back .
#Text=I 'm sorry for blowing up at you .
#Text=" Mako says : " That 's okay .
#Text=I think we 've both said things that we regret .
#Text=" Korra says : " Why did n't you just tell me the truth in the first place ?
#Text=" Mako says : " I know I should have , but ... I did n't wan na hurt you all over again .
#Text=I guess part of me wanted to forget about the break - up too .
#Text=" Korra says : " I think we both know that this .
#Text=Us ?
#Text=Does n't work .
#Text=" Mako says : " You 're right .
#Text=" Korra says : " It 's over .
#Text=For real this time .
#Text=" Mako says : " I 'll always love you , Korra .
#Text=" Korra says : " And I 'll always love you .
#Text=" Bolin says : " You want a hug ?
#Text=" Korra says : " The war of the Water Tribes is over .
#Text=Unalaq has been defeated , and the Northern fleet is returning home .
#Text=The Water Tribes will always be allies , but the Southern Tribe is now independent , and the Southern Council of Elders has appointed my father , Tonraq , to be your new chief !
#Text=I 've realized that even though we should learn from those who came before us , we must also forge our own path .
#Text=So that is why I 've decided to keep the portals open .
#Text=Humans can now physically enter the Spirit World , and spirits will be free to roam our world .
#Text=I will no longer be the bridge .
#Text=Humans and spirits must learn to live together .
#Text=My mission will always be to use Raava 's light spirit to guide the world toward peace and balance .
#Text=Harmonic Convergence has caused a shift in the planet 's energy .
#Text=I can feel it .
#Text=Things will never be the same again .
#Text=We 're entering a New Age .
#Text="
